name: Fernando Pires
biography: Fernando Pires is a founding member of The Timorese Cultural Group that was formed with the aim of reclaiming and recreating the culture through songs and dances. In 1997 Fernando was trained by the North Richmond Community Health Centre as an Arts Organisor and Theatre Director. Since that time he has developed and managed several theatrical projects and a series of cultural festivals with the Timorese community. Now working in EastTimor, Fernando is the director of the international development organization CARITAS Australia.
